title: Christ the universall peace-maker: or, The reconciliation of all the people of God, notwithstanding all their differences, enmities. / By Tho: Goodvvin, B.D.
author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Dawlman,
notes: The words "differences, enmities" are bracketed together on title page.
Also bound with some copies of Wing G1229 and G1229A.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 10 1650", the 51 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
